# chanlage of net vis
```{r}
data("Moreno")
op <- par(mar = rep(0, 4),
          mfrow = c(1, 2))
plot(Moreno,
     mode = "circle",
     vertex.cex = 1.5)
plot(Moreno,
     mode = "fruchtermanreingold",
     vertex.cex = 1.5)
par(op)
```
